content: 24 26 single_crochet around 24 27 single_crochet around 24 28 single_crochet 2 decrease x 6 18 stuff the pear with polyfil stuffing 29 single_crochet decrease x 6 12 30 single_crochet around 12 finish stuffing pear 31 decrease x 6 6 fasten_off with 24 tail use darning needle to stitch hole shut & send yarn down through the top center of the pear through to bottom center of the pear pull the yarn tight to create an indent in the top and bottom of the pear make several stitches in the bottom center of the pear knot off/weave in the yarn when finished add a brown yarn stem using the cheese using g hook worsted weight light yellow yarn make 1 1 chain 23 2 turn skip 2 stitches double_crochet 21 21 3 chain 2 turn double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch 3 single_crochet half_double_crochet in chain stitches double_crochet 11 21 6 chain 2 turn double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet 14 21 when you double_crochet into row 5 s slip stitches use the top available loop 7 chain 2 turn double_crochet 14 chain 5 double_crochet 2 21 8 chain 2 turn double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet in chain stitches double_crochet 14 21 9 chain 2 turn double_crochet 7 half_double_crochet single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet 10 21 10 chain 2 turn half_double_crochet 10 chain 4 half_double_crochet 7 21 11 chain 2 turn double_crochet 7 half_double_crochet single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet double_crochet 10 21 12 chain 2 turn half_double_crochet 21 21 13 chain 1 single_crochet around the entire edge of the cheese slice in each corner of the cheese slice single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet fasten_off yarn weave in end slice of salami using h hook coral worsted weight yarn dark red worsted weight yarn make 1 1 8 single_crochet in magic_ring capture/weave in ends as you go & end each row with a slip_stitch chain 1 8 2 increase around 16 3 single_crochet 1 increase x 8 24 4 single_crochet 2 increase x 8 32 5 single_crochet 3 increase x 8 40 6 single_crochet 4 increase x 8 fasten_off the coral yarn weave in end as yougo 48 7 continue with dark red yarn only single_crochet 5 increase
